topic: Social media influencers have more impact on young people than traditional role models like teachers and parents. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
essayText:
Influencer very popular now. Young people like them more than parent teacher. I agree this true.

Young people always on phone watch influencer. They want be like them have nice thing. My sister watch makeup video all day want buy everything.

Parent teacher boring for young people. They talk about study and rule but influencer talk about fun thing. Young people not listen parent anymore.

Influencer bad because only want money. They tell young people buy thing not necessary. Make them feel bad if not have expensive thing.

But some influencer good teach useful thing. Not all bad.

Parent teacher more important but young people dont know. They should listen family not stranger on internet.

So yes influencer have big impact on youth today. This problem for society.
weaknesses: Major grammatical errors in every sentence
